name: assimilation-pipeline-orchestration
description: Use to run the end-to-end assimilation phases: scan, analyze via Copilot SDK, license check, generate assets, build registry, and execute hooks.

name: repo-scanning-and-detection
description: Enumerate files, detect language/framework, and identify config/test/source directories.

name: copilot-sdk-analysis-session
description: Run semantic analysis with the Copilot SDK to extract skills, agents, and hooks.

name: asset-generation-templates
description: Generate SKILL.md, agent.yaml, and hook YAML with structured content and conventions.

name: registry-jsonl-search-ranking
description: Build and query a JSONL registry with relevance scoring, type filtering, and trigger matching.

name: hook-lifecycle-execution
description: Load and execute YAML-defined lifecycle hooks with optional conditions and controlled timeouts.

name: github-url-normalization-and-clone
description: Normalize GitHub URLs and perform shallow clones to a temp directory with cleanup.

name: license-detection-and-policy
description: Detect repository license from files and config, classify permissiveness, and gate generation.

name: cli-banners-and-versioning
description: Define a polished CLI with Commander, chalk-styled banners, versioning, and subcommands.

name: registry-search-table-output
description: Render search results as a fixed-width table with colored type labels.

name: asset-validation-rules
description: Validate generated skills, agents, hooks, and registry entries with actionable errors/warnings.

name: root
description: Main agent orchestrating repository assimilation and CLI lifecycle.

name: pipeline
description: Assimilation workflow engine and domain hub.

name: scanner
description: Repository scanning and detection sub-agent.

name: analyzer
description: Copilot SDK analysis sub-agent for pattern/skill/agent extraction.

name: generator
description: Asset generation sub-agent for skills, agents, and hooks.

name: registry
description: JSONL registry sub-agent for indexing and search.

name: hooks
description: Lifecycle hook execution sub-agent.

name: utils
description: Utility hub for Git and license operations.

name: git
description: GitHub URL normalization and shallow clone sub-agent.

name: license
description: License detection and policy gate sub-agent.

name: cli
description: CLI presentation and subcommand orchestration.

name: search
description: Registry search sub-agent with table output.

name: validate
description: Generated asset validation sub-agent.
